scripts.serve: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run install:branding && vue-cli-service serve
scripts.serve:https: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run install:branding && vue-cli-service serve --https
scripts.serve:prod: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run install:branding && vue-cli-service serve --mode production --port 38920
scripts.build: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run install:branding && vue-cli-service build
scripts.test:unit: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run install:branding && vue-cli-service test:unit --runInBand
scripts.cover:unit: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run install:branding && vue-cli-service test:unit --runInBand --collectCoverage
scripts.test:e2e:headless: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && vue-cli-service test:e2e --headless --browser chrome --url http://localhost:38920
scripts.docker:build: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run build && docker build . --tag gcr.io/hedera-registry/hedera-mirror-node-explorer
